sentence.Network_en: When violet is added to the medium blue a particularly striking, warm coloration is created.
sentence.Network_cn: 在中蓝色中加入蓝紫色就形成了一种格外鲜艳夺目的暖色。

sentence.Network_en: The absence of coloration in that drawing makes it dull.
sentence.Network_cn: 那幅画因没有着色而显得晦暗。

sentence.Network_en: Neither of the above substances gives smokeless powders an intense coloration.
sentence.Network_cn: 上述各物质,没有一个能使无烟药强烈着色.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent.: from late Latin coloratio(n-), from colorare 'to colour'

entry.tran: (动植物的)自然色彩，自然花纹
entry.def: The coloration of an animal or a plant is the colours and patterns on it.
